characters.name: Sunny
characters.description: The main protagonist. A frail orphan from the outskirts with pale skin and dark circles under his eyes. Awakens with the Shadow Slave Aspect, which grants him control over shadows, the ability to summon Shadow Echoes, and an ever-growing army of shadows. His Flaw 'Clear Conscience' means he cannot lie. Known for his cunning mind, dark humor, and survival instinct.

rank_progression.description: Completed Second Nightmare in Kingdom of Hope
Known as Master Sunless, teaches at Academy

characters.name: Nephis
characters.description: A beautiful silver-haired girl with burning grey eyes from Clan Valor. Daughter of the Broken Sword. Her Aspect 'Changing Star' (later 'Light Bringer') allows her to ignite with inner fire that both empowers and harms her. Her Flaw 'Pristine Soul' means she must suffer to use her power. One of the most powerful Awakened of her generation.
characters.flaw: Pristine Soul (Must suffer to use power)

characters.name: Cassie
characters.description: A blind girl with the gift of prophecy. Her visions of the future are terrifyingly accurate but come at great cost. Despite her gentle and kind nature, she carries heavy burdens and dark secrets. Uses a golden rope to guide herself. Later becomes associated with Clan Song.

rank_progression.description: Blind seer met on the Forgotten Shore
Reached Master rank with Clan Song

characters.name: Kai
characters.description: A handsome young man with a beautiful singing voice and charming personality. Found trapped in a well on the Forgotten Shore. His Aspect 'Nightingale' gives his voice special powers. Despite his pleasant exterior, he harbors dark secrets about his past.

rank_progression.description: Found in a well on the Forgotten Shore

characters.name: Effie
characters.description: A fierce warrior with incredible physical strength and an even more incredible appetite. First encountered throwing a bone at Sunny in Dark City. Despite her brash and lazy exterior, she is fiercely loyal and surprisingly perceptive. One of Sunny's closest friends.

rank_progression.description: First encountered in Dark City tower

characters.name: Caster
characters.description: A Legacy from Clan Song who initially seems arrogant and calculating. Proved to be a capable leader during the Forgotten Shore. Has complicated relationships with the cohort and hidden depths.

rank_progression.description: Met at the Academy as a Legacy

characters.name: Rain
characters.description: Sunny's younger sister whom he desperately tries to protect. Living in the outskirts, she represents Sunny's main motivation for surviving. Her potential awakening becomes a major plot point.

rank_progression.description: Sunny's beloved younger sister in the outskirts

characters.name: Shadow
characters.description: Sunny's own shadow which gained sentience due to his Aspect. Mischievous and sometimes defiant, but ultimately loyal. Can act independently, shape-shift, and has its own distinct sarcastic personality.

characters.name: Stone Saint
characters.description: Sunny's most powerful Echo. An ancient female Saint whose body turned to stone, she now serves as Sunny's primary combat shadow. Silent but deadly, she wields incredible power and is fiercely loyal.

characters.name: Soul Serpent
characters.description: A massive serpentine creature that Sunny binds as an Echo. Once ruled the waters near the Forgotten Shore. Serves as transportation and a powerful ally in battle.

characters.name: Nightmare
characters.description: A fearsome nightmare creature that becomes one of Sunny's shadow Echoes. A terrifying black steed that can traverse impossible terrain at incredible speeds.

characters.name: Fiend
characters.description: A terrifying Nightmare Creature that Sunny encounters and eventually binds. Known for its ferocity in combat.

characters.name: Scholar
characters.description: An older slave during Sunny's First Nightmare in the Black Mountain. Appears kind and knowledgeable but is calculating. Teaches Sunny valuable lessons about trust and survival.

characters.name: Shifty
characters.description: A fellow slave during the First Nightmare. A cunning but unfortunate soul who meets a tragic end early in the story.

characters.name: Hero
characters.description: A legendary Sleeper who fought valiantly during the First Nightmare on the Black Mountain. Sunny witnesses his heroic struggle against the Mountain King.

characters.name: Mountain King
characters.description: A massive Nightmare Creature that rules the Black Mountain. The main antagonist of Sunny's First Nightmare. An Awakened-rank tyrant of terrifying power.

characters.name: Gunlaug
characters.description: The tyrannical ruler of the Bright Castle on the Forgotten Shore. Once a hero, corrupted by power and desperation. Maintains order through fear and an iron fist. His fall marks a major turning point.

characters.name: Harus
characters.description: Gunlaug's cunning advisor with a hunched back. Despite his unassuming appearance, he is dangerous and calculating. A master manipulator.

characters.name: Gemma
characters.description: A skilled hunter from the Bright Castle who becomes an ally to Sunny's cohort. Brave and resourceful.

characters.name: Harper
characters.description: A healer at the Bright Castle who helps Sunny and his companions. Compassionate despite the harsh circumstances.

characters.name: Jet
characters.description: A powerful Master who becomes Sunny's mentor in the waking world. Cold and efficient in battle, but deeply cares for her students. Her Aspect 'Soul Reaper' makes her deadly. Teaches Sunny essential combat skills.

characters.name: Teacher Julius
characters.description: An instructor at the Awakened Academy who teaches Sleepers about the Dream Realm and survival. Knowledgeable and somewhat eccentric.

characters.name: Mordret
characters.description: A terrifying and mysterious figure with the ability to possess bodies through reflections. One of the most dangerous beings Sunny encounters. Has connections to Clan Valor and a tragic past.

characters.name: Noctis
characters.description: An ancient Sovereign connected to shadow powers. Has deep connections to Sunny's Aspect and the nature of shadows themselves. One of the most powerful beings in existence.

rank_progression.description: One of the ancient god-like Sovereigns

characters.name: Valor Matriarch
characters.description: The powerful leader of Clan Valor. Nephis's grandmother and a key political figure among the Great Clans. Commands immense respect and power.

rank_progression.description: Leader of Clan Valor, one of the Seven Saints

characters.name: Ki Song
characters.description: The patriarch of Clan Song. A powerful figure who leads one of the Great Clans with wisdom and foresight.

characters.name: Whispering Blade
characters.description: A powerful Saint of Clan Valor. Known for his deadly blade techniques and unwavering loyalty to the clan.

rank_progression.description: One of Clan Valor's most powerful Saints

characters.name: Broken Sword
characters.description: Nephis's father, a disgraced warrior of Clan Valor. His story is intertwined with Nephis's motivation and the clan's dark secrets.

characters.name: Weaver
characters.description: A primordial entity responsible for weaving the fundamental fabric of reality. Connected to fate, destiny, and the very structure of the Dream Realm. One of the most mysterious beings.

characters.name: Ananke
characters.description: A mysterious entity associated with fate and inevitability. Encountered in the Tomb of Ariel. One of the most enigmatic beings in the Dream Realm.

characters.name: Hope
characters.description: A powerful Daemon who created the Kingdom of Hope. Known for creating illusions and imaginary constructs. Her story is one of tragedy and beauty.

characters.name: Sun God
characters.description: An ancient deity of immense power associated with light and fire. His wrath destroyed Hope's kingdom. One of the divine beings of the old world.

characters.name: Dread Lord
characters.description: A powerful and fearsome ruler encountered in Twilight. Commands respect and fear from all who know of him. A major antagonist in the later story.

characters.name: Soul Stealer
characters.description: A terrifying being with the power to steal souls. One of the major threats in the later story, found in Twilight.

characters.name: Undying Slaughter
characters.description: A fearsome being that cannot be killed by conventional means. Encountered in Twilight alongside the Dread Lord.

characters.name: Revel
characters.description: A powerful and dangerous opponent encountered in the War arc. Known for incredible combat prowess and berserker fury.

characters.name: Morgan
characters.description: A powerful figure from Clan Valor with connections to Nephis's past. Plays a significant role in clan politics and has her own agenda.

characters.name: Solvane
characters.description: A knowledgeable character encountered in the Chained Isles. Provides important information about the Kingdom of Hope.

characters.name: Belle
characters.description: An Awakened with charm-based abilities. Encountered during Sunny's government work.

characters.name: Samara
characters.description: A skilled warrior who joins Sunny's team during the Antarctic campaign.

characters.name: Naeve
characters.description: A Master-rank Awakened encountered during government operations. Skilled and professional.

characters.name: Sybil
characters.description: A character with prophetic abilities encountered later in the story.

characters.name: Asterion
characters.description: A powerful being associated with ancient labyrinths and protection.

characters.name: Dire Fang
characters.description: A fearsome creature or warrior encountered in the later arcs.

characters.name: Sid
characters.description: A fierce warrior whose final battle with Felise takes place during the Great War. Their confrontation spans the battlefield.

characters.name: Felise
characters.description: A warrior locked in deadly combat with Sid during the Great War. Their rivalry culminates in an epic confrontation.

characters.name: Carapace Demon
characters.description: Nightmare Creatures with hard armored shells. Common but dangerous foes on the Forgotten Shore. Come in various ranks.

characters.name: Carapace Scavenger
characters.description: The weakest variant of Carapace creatures. Pack hunters that feed on corpses.

characters.name: Carapace Centurion
characters.description: A more powerful variant of the Carapace Demon. Commands lesser creatures and poses a significant threat.

characters.name: Blood Fiend
characters.description: A terrifying Nightmare Creature that hunts in the darkness. Extremely dangerous and aggressive.

characters.name: Spire Messenger
characters.description: Flying Nightmare Creatures that soar through the Dream Realm. Fast and deadly.

characters.name: Fallen Titan
characters.description: Massive Nightmare Creatures of devastating power. Can destroy cities and challenge Saints.

characters.name: Clan Valor
characters.description: One of the Great Clans, known for producing powerful warriors. Nephis's clan. Values strength and honor above all. Led by the Matriarch.

characters.name: Clan Song
characters.description: One of the Great Clans, known for their prophecies and oracles. Cassie and Caster are associated with them. Masters of foresight.

characters.name: Great Clans
characters.description: The most powerful families that control much of human society. Include Valor, Song, Night, and others. Command enormous resources and political power.

characters.name: Government
characters.description: The governing body of human civilization. Manages Awakened forces and coordinates the defense against Nightmare Creatures.

characters.name: First Irregular Company
characters.description: A special military unit formed for the Antarctic Campaign. Led by or including Sunny, they take on the most dangerous missions.

characters.name: Night Temple
characters.description: A mysterious organization or location associated with shadow and darkness.

characters.name: Song Army
characters.description: The military forces of Clan Song, deployed during the Great War.

characters.name: Puppeteer's Shroud
characters.description: Sunny's signature armor Memory obtained from his First Nightmare. A silk armor that can transform, repair itself, and protect against attacks. Awakened rank.

characters.name: Midnight Shard
characters.description: A dark blade Memory that Sunny wields. Can extend and retract like a shadow. One of his primary weapons.

characters.name: Cruel Sight
characters.description: A Memory that enhances Sunny's perception and sight. Allows him to see through deceptions and darkness.

characters.name: Covetous Coffer
characters.description: A Memory that provides extra-dimensional storage. Sunny uses it to carry equipment and resources.

characters.name: Shadow Lantern
characters.description: A powerful Divine-rank Memory that Sunny acquires. Can open gates between realms and control shadow and light.

characters.name: Sin of Solace
characters.description: A powerful sword Memory with its own consciousness. One of Sunny's signature weapons in later arcs. Has a dark history.

characters.name: Mantle of the Underworld
characters.description: A Memory associated with the underworld and death. Provides powerful protective and offensive capabilities.

characters.name: Weaver's Mask
characters.description: A mysterious Memory connected to the Weaver. Grants Sunny unique abilities related to perception and identity.

terms.name: Nightmare Spell
terms.description: The mysterious force that descended upon Earth, bringing the Dream Realm and Nightmare Creatures. It grants humans the chance to become Awakened through surviving Nightmares. Changed humanity forever.

terms.name: Dream Realm
terms.description: A parallel dimension where Nightmare Creatures originate. Connected to Earth through the Nightmare Spell. Contains countless dangers, ancient secrets, and powerful treasures.

terms.name: Waking World
terms.description: The real world, as opposed to the Dream Realm. Where humanity struggles to survive against Gates and invading Nightmare Creatures.

terms.name: First Nightmare
terms.description: The trial every Sleeper must survive to become Awakened. A dangerous journey through the Dream Realm where death is common but survival grants power.

terms.name: Second Nightmare
terms.description: The trial to advance from Awakened to Ascended. More dangerous than the First, with lower survival rates. Sunny completes his in the Kingdom of Hope.

terms.name: Third Nightmare
terms.description: The trial to advance from Ascended to Master. Survival rate is extremely low. Only the most powerful attempt it.

terms.name: Fourth Nightmare
terms.description: The trial to advance from Master to Saint. Legendary in difficulty. Few ever attempt it, fewer survive.

terms.name: Nightmare Creature
terms.description: Monstrous beings from the Dream Realm that threaten humanity. Range from weak Dormant to god-like Unholy. Killing them yields soul shards and sometimes Memories.

terms.name: Nightmare Gate
terms.description: Portals between the real world and Dream Realm. Can appear randomly or be created. When open, Nightmare Creatures can invade.

terms.name: Seed of Nightmare
terms.description: Locations where the Dream Realm bleeds into reality, spawning Nightmare Creatures. Must be destroyed or contained before they grow.

terms.name: Sleeper
terms.description: A human marked by the Nightmare Spell but who hasn't yet undergone their First Nightmare. Training at academies to prepare for their trial.

terms.name: Awakened
terms.description: Humans who survived their First Nightmare and gained supernatural powers. The second rank of power. Can use Aspects and Memories.

terms.name: Ascended
terms.description: The third rank of power for humans. Represents significant growth from Awakened. Can challenge Fallen creatures and access greater power.

terms.name: Master
terms.description: The fourth rank of power. Masters are elite Awakened with multiple soul cores. Can fight Corrupted creatures. Sunny becomes Master in Chapter 751.

terms.name: Saint
terms.description: The fifth rank of power. Saints possess god-like abilities and are extremely rare. Can manifest Domains that reshape reality around them.

terms.name: Sovereign
terms.description: The highest known rank. Sovereigns are god-like beings with reality-warping powers. Only a handful exist in all of history.

terms.name: Dormant
terms.description: The lowest class of Nightmare Creatures. Weak individually but dangerous in numbers. Also the first rank of Memories.

terms.name: Fallen
terms.description: Third rank of Nightmare Creatures. Powerful and challenging for most Awakened to face alone.

terms.name: Corrupted
terms.description: Fourth rank of Nightmare Creatures. Twisted and especially dangerous. Require Master-level Awakened to defeat.

terms.name: Titan
terms.description: The most powerful class of normal Nightmare Creatures. Can destroy cities and challenge Saints.

terms.name: Unholy
terms.description: The highest rank of Nightmare Creatures. God-like beings of terrifying power.

terms.name: Transcendent
terms.description: Fourth rank of Memories. Significantly more powerful than Ascended-rank items.

terms.name: Supreme
terms.description: Fifth rank of Memories. Extremely rare and powerful.

terms.name: Sacred
terms.description: Sixth rank of Memories. Nearly legendary in power.

terms.name: Divine
terms.description: The highest rank of Memories. Incredibly rare and powerful. The Shadow Lantern is Divine rank.

terms.name: Aspect
terms.description: The unique supernatural ability granted after becoming Awakened. Defines powers and fighting style. Each Aspect is unique to its bearer.

terms.name: Flaw
terms.description: A weakness or curse that comes with every Aspect. Can be deadly or merely inconvenient. Sunny's flaw 'Clear Conscience' prevents him from lying.

terms.name: Soul Core
terms.description: The source of an Awakened's power. Contains their essence and abilities. More cores mean more power. Awakened have one, Masters have multiple.

terms.name: Memory
terms.description: Magical items created from the remnants of defeated Nightmare Creatures or powerful beings. Can be weapons, armor, or tools with supernatural properties.

terms.name: Echo
terms.description: Creatures bound to serve an Awakened, created from defeated Nightmare Creatures. Sunny's Echoes include Saint, Serpent, and Nightmare.

terms.name: True Name
terms.description: The fundamental name of a being that holds power over their existence. Knowing someone's True Name grants influence over them.

terms.name: Soul Sea
terms.description: The inner realm where an Awakened's soul cores, Memories, and Echoes are stored. A personal dimension of power.

terms.name: Soul Essence
terms.description: The energy that powers Awakened abilities. Must be managed carefully in combat. Gained by killing creatures.

terms.name: Domain
terms.description: An area of absolute control that Saints can manifest. Within a Domain, the Saint's power is supreme.

terms.name: Attribute
terms.description: Fundamental stats like Strength, Agility, Perception that define an Awakened's capabilities. Increased by gaining power.

terms.name: Legacy
terms.description: Descendants of powerful Awakened who inherit enhanced potential and resources. Often members of Great Clans with advantages from birth.

terms.name: Lineage
terms.description: Inherited traits and powers from ancestors. Important for Legacy families and clan politics.

terms.name: Shadow Slave
terms.description: Sunny's unique Aspect. Allows him to control shadows, create shadow copies, command shadow Echoes, and build an army of shadows. His power grows with each bound shadow.

terms.name: Shadow Fragment
terms.description: Resources Sunny collects by defeating enemies. Used to enhance his shadow abilities and bind new shadows.

terms.name: Shadow Step
terms.description: Sunny's ability to move instantly through shadows. Essential for combat and escape.

terms.name: Shadow Dance
terms.description: Sunny's signature combat technique. Allows him to merge with shadows and strike from impossible angles.

terms.name: Shadow Manifestation
terms.description: Advanced shadow technique allowing creation of solid shadow constructs. Mastered as an Ascended.

terms.name: Bone Weave
terms.description: An attribute Sunny gains that reinforces his body with shadow power. Makes him incredibly durable.

terms.name: Blood Weave
terms.description: A technique involving the manipulation of blood and life force. Powerful but dangerous.

terms.name: Soul Weave
terms.description: Advanced technique involving manipulation of soul energy. Gained as Sunny grows in power.

terms.name: Clear Conscience
terms.description: Sunny's Flaw. He cannot lie. This forces him to be creative with truth and misdirection.

terms.name: Daemon
terms.description: Powerful beings, neither fully Nightmare Creature nor human. Often ancient and mysterious. Examples include Hope and various gods.

terms.name: Weave
terms.description: The fundamental structure underlying reality and the Dream Realm. Can be perceived and manipulated by powerful beings.

terms.name: Sun God
terms.description: An ancient deity of immense power. His wrath destroyed Hope's kingdom. Associated with light and divine judgment.

terms.name: War God
terms.description: An ancient deity associated with battle and conflict. Worshipped in ancient times.

terms.name: Great Clans
terms.description: The most powerful families in human society. Control vast resources and political power. Include Valor, Song, Night, and others.

terms.name: Cohort
terms.description: A group of Awakened who survived together. Bonds forged in the Dream Realm are strong. Sunny's cohort includes Nephis, Cassie, Kai, Effie, and Caster.

terms.name: Outskirts
terms.description: The poor, lawless districts on the edges of cities. Where Sunny grew up. Dangerous and impoverished.

terms.name: Citadel
terms.description: Major fortified human settlements designed to withstand Nightmare Creature attacks. Centers of human civilization.

locations.name: Dream Realm
locations.description: A parallel dimension where Nightmare Creatures originate. Connected to Earth through the Nightmare Spell. Contains countless dangers, ancient civilizations, and powerful secrets.

locations.name: Black Mountain
locations.description: The location of Sunny's First Nightmare. A treacherous mountain ruled by the Mountain King. Where Sunny's journey truly begins.

locations.name: Forgotten Shore
locations.description: A dangerous coastal region where many Sleepers are sent for their First Nightmare. Features ruins of an ancient civilization, deadly creatures, the Bright Castle, and the Dark City.

locations.name: Bright Castle
locations.description: A fortified castle on the Forgotten Shore. The main safe haven for survivors, ruled tyrannically by Gunlaug. Its fall marks a major turning point.

locations.name: Dark City
locations.description: A massive ruined metropolis on the Forgotten Shore. Built by a lost civilization, now filled with powerful Nightmare Creatures and ancient secrets.

locations.name: Labyrinth
locations.description: A massive maze-like structure in the Dream Realm. Contains valuable treasures but is extremely dangerous to navigate.

locations.name: Chained Isles
locations.description: A region of floating islands held together by seven ancient chains. Connected to the Demon of Hope and the Kingdom of Hope.

locations.name: Kingdom of Hope
locations.description: A beautiful realm created by the Demon of Hope/Imagination. Where Sunny undergoes his Second Nightmare. Both wondrous and tragic.

locations.name: Ivory Tower
locations.description: A significant structure in the Chained Isles. Associated with knowledge, power, and ancient secrets.

locations.name: Sky Below
locations.description: The vast emptiness beneath the Chained Isles. Falling into it means certain death. A place of horror and mystery.

locations.name: Tomb of Ariel
locations.description: An ancient structure where time flows differently. Home to the Riverborn and Outsiders. Contains secrets about the nature of time itself.

locations.name: Great River
locations.description: A massive river within the Tomb of Ariel where time flows strangely. The Riverborn live along its banks.

locations.name: Twilight
locations.description: A mysterious region between light and darkness. Home to the Dread Lord, Soul Stealer, and other dangers. A place of great power and terror.

locations.name: Estuary
locations.description: A location where the Great River meets other waters. A significant landmark in the Dream Realm.

locations.name: Night Temple
locations.description: A mysterious temple associated with darkness and shadow. Contains secrets related to Sunny's powers.

locations.name: Outskirts
locations.description: The poor, lawless districts on the edges of cities. Sunny's birthplace and childhood home. Where Rain still lives.

locations.name: Spell Academy
locations.description: Schools that train Sleepers before their First Nightmare. Where Sunny met Nephis, Caster, and learned about the Nightmare Spell.

locations.name: Antarctic
locations.description: The frozen continent, site of crucial battles against Nightmare Creatures. Where Sunny earns the title 'Devil of Antarctica'.

locations.name: Falcon Scott
locations.description: A research station in Antarctica that became the site of a massive siege against Nightmare Creatures. The Fall of Falcon Scott is a major event.

locations.name: Citadel
locations.description: Major fortified human settlements. Centers of civilization protected against Nightmare Creature incursions.

events.name: Nightmare Spell Descends
events.description: The cataclysmic event that changed humanity forever, bringing the Dream Realm and Nightmare Creatures to Earth. The beginning of a new era.

events.name: Sunny's First Nightmare Begins
events.description: Sunny enters the Dream Realm as a slave on the Black Mountain. The beginning of his transformation from outcast to legend.

events.name: Battle with Mountain King
events.description: The climactic confrontation with the tyrant of the Black Mountain. Sunny witnesses Hero's sacrifice and gains the Puppeteer's Shroud.

events.name: Shadow Slave Aspect Revealed
events.description: The Nightmare Spell reveals Sunny's unique Aspect: Shadow Slave. The moment that defines his entire journey.

events.name: Clear Conscience Flaw Revealed
events.description: Sunny discovers his Flaw: he cannot lie. Three simple words that will shape every interaction he ever has.

events.name: Arrival on Forgotten Shore
events.description: Sunny's true First Nightmare begins on the desolate coast of the Forgotten Shore. A year of survival awaits.

events.name: Meeting Nephis
events.description: Sunny first encounters Nephis at the Academy. The beginning of their complex relationship.

events.name: Meeting Cassie
events.description: Sunny meets the blind oracle Cassie. Her prophecies will guide and haunt them all.

events.name: Cohort Formation
events.description: The cohort comes together: Sunny, Nephis, Cassie, Kai, Effie, and Caster unite to survive.

events.name: Stone Saint Acquired
events.description: Sunny discovers and binds the Stone Saint Echo. His most powerful shadow is born.

events.name: Fall of Gunlaug
events.description: The tyrannical ruler of Bright Castle is finally defeated. The castle's fall forces the cohort to flee.

events.name: Escape from Forgotten Shore
events.description: The cohort's desperate journey to escape the Dream Realm and return to the waking world.

events.name: Sunny Becomes Awakened
events.description: After surviving the horrors of the Forgotten Shore, Sunny officially becomes an Awakened with multiple shadow cores.

events.name: Soul Serpent Bound
events.description: Sunny defeats and binds the Soul Serpent, gaining a powerful ally and transportation.

events.name: Meeting Mordret
events.description: First encounter with the Prince of Nothing through a broken mirror. A terrifying connection is formed.

events.name: Discovery of Kingdom of Hope
events.description: Sunny enters the beautiful realm created by the Demon of Hope for his Second Nightmare.

events.name: Second Nightmare Complete
events.description: Sunny survives the nightmare within the Kingdom of Hope and becomes Ascended.

events.name: Master Sunless
events.description: Sunny achieves Master rank and begins teaching at the Awakened Academy. His reputation grows.

events.name: First Irregular Company Formed
events.description: Sunny's special military unit is established for the Antarctic Campaign.

events.name: Antarctic Campaign Begins
events.description: A major military operation against Nightmare Creatures in Antarctica. Sunny leads the charge.

events.name: Siege of Falcon Scott
events.description: Desperate battle at the Antarctic research station. One of the largest battles against Nightmare Creatures.

events.name: Devil of Antarctica
events.description: Sunny earns his fearsome title through incredible feats during the Antarctic Campaign.

events.name: Entering Tomb of Ariel
events.description: Sunny enters the ancient tomb where time flows differently. Encounters with the Riverborn await.

events.name: Meeting Ananke
events.description: Encounter with the mysterious entity of fate and inevitability in the Tomb.

events.name: Twilight Expedition
events.description: Journey to Twilight to confront the Dread Lord and Soul Stealer. A mission of rescue and revelation.

events.name: The Great War Begins
events.description: Massive conflict erupts between human factions and Nightmare Creatures. The Song Army marches to war.

events.name: Sid vs Felise
events.description: Epic confrontation between two warriors during the Great War. Their battle spans the battlefield.

events.name: A New Beginning
events.description: The final chapter. Sunny faces his destiny as the story reaches its conclusion.
